articles.title: Stock Market LIVE Updates: Nifty around 19,450, Sensex down 250 pts dragged by metal, bank, FMCG - Moneycontrol
articles.description: Sensex Today | Stock Market LIVE Updates: HCL Technologies, Titan Company, LTIMindtree, Power Grid Corp and M&M are among the top gainers on the Nifty, while losers are SBI Life Insurance, IndusInd Bank, Hindalco, NTPC and Divis Labs.

articles.author: Trisha Thadani, Jeremy B. Merrill
articles.title: Robotaxis are now allowed in San Francisco, whether locals want it or not - The Washington Post
articles.description: In a pivotal moment for the autonomous transportation industry, California chose to expand one of the biggest test cases for the technology.
articles.content:

SAN FRANCISCO California regulators voted Thursday to allow self-driving car companies Waymo and Cruise to offer 24/7 paid taxi service in San Francisco, a major win f… [+10686 chars]
